content:
From: nipkow@in.tum.de
Thanks to the work of Florian Haftmann and Tjark Weber and thanks to your
input we have recently added an item "Isabelle in your neighbourhood" to the
community page: http://isabelle.in.tum.de/community.html

If you would like to be added, just drop us a line - I think there are more
sites than the map shows.

Best,
Tobias
